entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Shoal Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -20.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shoal Lake 03:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -20.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -26.6°C
Wind: SE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
